title: Singapore Sweet and Sour Pork
ingredients: ['1 (450g) pork fillet, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 tablespoon water', '1 egg, beaten', '2 tablespoon tapioca starch*', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 green or red pepper, chopped', '1 red chilli, chopped', '120g crushed pineapple', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 tablespoons gluten-free cornflour', '4 tablespoons white vinegar', '3 tablespoons ketchup', '2 tablespoons plum sauce', '5 tablespoons water']
